fields.name: Speed Trap (Passive):
fields.value: Receive a random list of players who outplaced you, based on your score.

fields.name: Search for Weapons:
fields.value: Target a player caught by your speed trap. Roleblock them (unless they were roleblocked last night) and learn whether they could kill you.

fields.name: Check Records (Charge 65%):
fields.value: Target a player caught by your speed trap. Roleblock them (unless they were roleblocked last night) and learn whether you can win together.

fields.name: Throw The Book At 'Em (1x, Locked):
fields.value: Unlock and gain one ammo each time you place in the top 3. Target another player who placed in the top 3 and their score will be reduced by (your score divided by 2) the following evening, if you can't win together. You will learn that evening if this deduction triggers. This ability cannot be affected by investigation modifiers.

fields.name: Paramilitary Training (Passive):
fields.value: Automatically counterattack anyone who attacks you. This passive takes priority over the triggering attack, but does not prevent the attack. Additionally, you are immune to roleblocks.

fields.name: Big Hat (Passive):
fields.value: Any lower-scoring Investigative or Deception subalignment player who visits you will learn you are the State Trooper.
